alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Kittitas Valley; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 10:15PM PST until January 10 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon, Grande Ronde Valley, John Day Basin, North Central Oregon and Central Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington, Kittitas Valley and Yakima Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Kittitas Valley; Yakima Valley
